com.gej.collision

Class QuadTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gej.collision.QuadTree

  • public class QuadTree
extends java.lang.Object
    A QuadTree implementation to reduce collision checks. Every level contains a maximum of 10 objects and the tree sub divides on exceeding this limit.
    Author:
    Sri Harsha Chilakapati

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuadTree()
      Construct a QuadTree with default values.
      QuadTree(int l, java.awt.Rectangle b)
      Construct a QuadTree with custom values.
